LocaleSelector.Bottom Right: You can change the language at any time in the bottom right corner of the page. ↘️

ModalError.Heading: An error occurred
ModalError.Subheading: Sorry about that, our team take bug reports seriously, and will try to make it right!
ModalError.Common Steps: Some common troubleshooting steps that might be helpful:
ModalError.Refresh Explanation: most of our pages save your progress as you go, so it's almost always fine to reload the page.
ModalError.Connection Explanation: this site requires connection to the internet for most functionality.
ModalError.Desktop: Visit this site on a desktop computer
ModalError.Desktop Explanation: this site works best on desktop web browsers.
ModalError.If Persists: If this issue persists, please report this issue by
ModalError.File a Bug: filing a bug in the PACTA repository

ModalPermissionDenied.Heading: Permission Denied
ModalPermissionDenied.Subheading: You aren't authorized to view this page
ModalPermissionDenied.How You Got Here: It is likely that you have gotten here either by entering in an invalid URL, or by clicking on a link or button that is not set up correctly.
ModalPermissionDenied.Email Us: If you think this is a bug (something that you should have access to), or if you want to let us know how you got here, please email us at
